caption.p: Pre-movement Beta LFP power in three cats ( A– C). Box-whisker plot showing distribution of analysed data (individual trials shown in grey circles), in each major adaptation epoch considered. Black error bars show mean and standard error of bootstrap re-sampling (n = 1000) of data. Asterisks show significant pairwise comparisons (Bonferroni corrected), *p < 0.05, **p < 0.01. Baseline baseline epoch, EA early adaptation epoch, LA late adaptation epoch, EAft early aftereffect epoch, LAft late aftereffect epoch.
